name: Ballroom Brawl
description:
Go toe-to-toe for your maiden's hand in an all-out ballroom brawl! A simple single player beat-em-up, Ballroom Brawl has you, the classy Sir-Man, fight off various enemies who contest with you for the hand of your true love.

This game was written in 30 hours for a Steampunk-themed game jam. Further post-jam updates may ensue!
